Document.name: RepeatingTaskExecutor
Document.summary: Queued task executor. It is different from a thread pool by: 1) Task execution is single threaded, 2) If you queue a task, it will override the the unexecuted queued task.
Document.typeparam: The type of the argument to run a task.
Document.signature: template < typename T > class RepeatingTaskExecutor : Object;
